SEARCH
Module com.example.dicegame
Package controllers

Class GameScreenController

java.lang.Object
controllers.GameScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller, GameObserver
public class GameScreenController extends Object implements Controller, GameObserver
Controller class for managing the game screen UI and interactions. Implements GameObserver to receive game state updates.
